languages.text: "Офицером {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Навис Империалис{/g}", {n}— с гордостью отвечает Абеляр.{/n} "Не знаю, уместно ли здесь слово "был" — это судьба и суть жизни, а не работа. Я был счастлив служить Лорд-капитану Теодоре. Но душой и разумом я все еще имперский офицер".

"I used to be an officer in the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Navis Imperialis{/g}," {n}Abelard replies proudly.{/n} "No, 'used to be' is not quite right. It was not simply a job — it was my calling, the essence of my life. I was proud to serve Lord Captain Theodora, but in my heart and mind, I am still an officer of the Imperium."
languages.original_text: "Офицером {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Навис Империалис{/g}", {n}— с гордостью отвечает Абеляр.{/n} "Не знаю, уместно ли здесь слово "был" — это судьба и суть жизни, а не работа. Я был счастлив служить Лорд-капитану Теодоре. Но душой и разумом я все еще имперский офицер".

traits.locale_text: "I used to be an officer in the Navis Imperialis," {n}Abelard replies proudly.{/n} "No, 'used to be' is not quite right. It was not simply a job — it was my calling, the essence of my life. I was happy to serve Lord Captain Theodora. But in my heart and mind, I am still an Imperial officer."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I used to be an officer in the Navis Imperialis," {n}Abelard replies proudly.{/n} "No, 'used to be' is not quite right. It was not simply a job — it was my calling, the essence of my life. I was happy to serve Lord Captain Theodora. But in my heart and mind, I am still an Imperial officer."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I used to be an officer in the Navis Imperialis," {n}Abelard replies proudly.{/n} "No, 'used to be' is not quite right. It was not simply a job — it was my calling, the essence of my life. I was happy to serve Lord Captain Theodora. But in my heart and mind, I am still an Imperial officer."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I used to be an officer in the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Navis Imperialis{/g}," {n}Abelard replies proudly.{/n} "No, 'used to be' is not quite right. It was not simply a job — it was my calling, the essence of my life. I was proud to serve Lord Captain Theodora, but in my heart and mind, I am still an officer of the Imperium."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “我曾是{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}帝国海军{/g}的军官。”{n}阿贝拉德自豪地回答道。{/n}“不，‘曾是’这个词不够准确。对我而言，那不仅仅是我的工作，更是我的人生意义，是我生命的本质。能为西奥多拉领主舰长服务，我感到非常自豪，但在我心中，在我的思想深处，我依然是一位帝国军官。”
languages.original_text: "I used to be an officer in the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Navis Imperialis{/g}," {n}Abelard replies proudly.{/n} "No, 'used to be' is not quite right. It was not simply a job — it was my calling, the essence of my life. I was proud to serve Lord Captain Theodora, but in my heart and mind, I am still an officer of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: “我曾是{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}帝国海军{/g}的军官。”{n}阿贝拉德自豪地回答道。{/n}“不，‘曾是’这个词不够准确。对我而言，那不仅仅是我的工作，更是我的人生意义，是我生命的本质。能为西奥多拉领主舰长服务，我感到非常自豪，但在我心中，在我的思想深处，我依然是一位帝国军官。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "I used to be an officer in the Navis Imperialis," {n}Abelard replies proudly.{/n} "No, 'used to be' is not quite right. It was not simply a job — it was my calling, the essence of my life. I was proud to serve Lord Captain Theodora, but in my heart and mind, I am still an officer of the Imperium."

languages.text: «Fui oficial de la {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Navis Imperialis{/g}». {n}Abelard responde orgulloso.{/n} «Bueno, decir que lo "fui" no sería del todo correcto. No es un simple trabajo. Es mi vocación, la esencia de mi vida. He servido a la Lord Capitán Theodora con orgullo, pero en lo más hondo de mi mente y corazón sigo siendo oficial del Imperium».
languages.original_text: "I used to be an officer in the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Navis Imperialis{/g}," {n}Abelard replies proudly.{/n} "No, 'used to be' is not quite right. It was not simply a job — it was my calling, the essence of my life. I was proud to serve Lord Captain Theodora, but in my heart and mind, I am still an officer of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: «Fui oficial de la {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Navis Imperialis{/g}». {n}Abelard responde orgulloso.{/n} «Bueno, decir que lo "fui" no sería del todo correcto. No es un simple trabajo. Es mi vocación, la esencia de mi vida. He servido a la Lord Capitán Theodora con orgullo, pero en lo más hondo de mi mente y corazón sigo siendo oficial del Imperium».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「私はかつて、{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}帝国宇宙軍{/g}の士官でした」{n}アベラルドは誇らしげに答える。{/n}「いえ、『かつて』というのは語弊がありますね。あれは単なる仕事ではなく、私の天職であり、人生の本質だったのです。ロード・キャプテン・シオドーラに仕えることを誇りに思いましたが、心の中では今も帝国軍の士官です」
languages.original_text: "I used to be an officer in the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Navis Imperialis{/g}," {n}Abelard replies proudly.{/n} "No, 'used to be' is not quite right. It was not simply a job — it was my calling, the essence of my life. I was proud to serve Lord Captain Theodora, but in my heart and mind, I am still an officer of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: 「私はかつて、{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}帝国宇宙軍{/g}の士官でした」{n}アベラルドは誇らしげに答える。{/n}「いえ、『かつて』というのは語弊がありますね。あれは単なる仕事ではなく、私の天職であり、人生の本質だったのです。ロード・キャプテン・シオドーラに仕えることを誇りに思いましたが、心の中では今も帝国軍の士官です」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ich war früher Offizier in der {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Navis Imperialis{/g}"{n}, antwortet Abelard stolz.{/n} "Nein, 'ich war' stimmt nicht ganz. Es war nicht nur ein Beruf — es war meine Berufung, die Essenz meines Lebens. Ich war stolz, Lord Captain Theodora zu dienen, doch in meinem Herzen und meinem Verstand bin ich noch immer Offizier des Imperiums."
languages.original_text: "I used to be an officer in the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Navis Imperialis{/g}," {n}Abelard replies proudly.{/n} "No, 'used to be' is not quite right. It was not simply a job — it was my calling, the essence of my life. I was proud to serve Lord Captain Theodora, but in my heart and mind, I am still an officer of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: "Ich war früher Offizier in der {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Navis Imperialis{/g}"{n}, antwortet Abelard stolz.{/n} "Nein, 'ich war' stimmt nicht ganz. Es war nicht nur ein Beruf — es war meine Berufung, die Essenz meines Lebens. Ich war stolz, Lord Captain Theodora zu dienen, doch in meinem Herzen und meinem Verstand bin ich noch immer Offizier des Imperiums."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « J'étais officier dans la {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Navis Imperialis{/g}, {n}répond fièrement Abélard.{/n} Non, ce n'est pas tout à fait juste. Il ne s'agissait pas d'un simple métier à mes yeux, mais d'une vocation, l'essence de ma vie. Même si ce fut un honneur de servir la seigneure-capitaine Théodora, au fond, je resterai toujours un officier de l'Imperium. »
languages.original_text: "I used to be an officer in the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Navis Imperialis{/g}," {n}Abelard replies proudly.{/n} "No, 'used to be' is not quite right. It was not simply a job — it was my calling, the essence of my life. I was proud to serve Lord Captain Theodora, but in my heart and mind, I am still an officer of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: « J'étais officier dans la {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Navis Imperialis{/g}, {n}répond fièrement Abélard.{/n} Non, ce n'est pas tout à fait juste. Il ne s'agissait pas d'un simple métier à mes yeux, mais d'une vocation, l'essence de ma vie. Même si ce fut un honneur de servir la seigneure-capitaine Théodora, au fond, je resterai toujours un officier impérial. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Bir {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Navis İmperialis{/g} subayıydım." {n}Abelard gururla yanıtlıyor.{/n} "Gerçi 'subayıydım' demek pek doğru olmaz. Yaptığım, basit bir işten ziyade hayatımın özü ve amacıydı. Lord Kaptan Theodora'ya hizmet etmekten gurur duyuyordum. Fakat zihnimde ve kalbimde hâlâ bir İmparatorluk subayıyım."
languages.original_text: "I used to be an officer in the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Navis Imperialis{/g}," {n}Abelard replies proudly.{/n} "No, 'used to be' is not quite right. It was not simply a job — it was my calling, the essence of my life. I was proud to serve Lord Captain Theodora, but in my heart and mind, I am still an officer of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: "Bir {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavy}Navis Imperialis{/g} subayıydım." {n}Abelard, gururla yanıtlıyor.{/n} "Gerçi 'subayıydım' demek pek doğru olmaz. Yaptığım, basit bir işten ziyade hayatımın özü ve amacıydı. Lord Kaptan Theodora'ya hizmet etmekten gurur duyuyordum. Fakat zihnimde ve kalbimde hâlâ bir İmparatorluk subayıyım."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
